response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed all expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. We are offering this exceptional piece to you at an exclusive price of $850,000. We believe that this opportunity is not only a chance for you to acquire a remarkable asset but also to partner with us in valuing excellence and craftsmanship. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 850000}
